item.title: From Adversity to Triumph: My Journey at Barcelona School of Economics
item.description: From Adversity to Triumph: My Journey at Barcelona School of Economics Graduation day at the prestigious Barcelona School of Economics marks the culmination of a remarkable journey of resilience, dedication, and transformation.

item.title: Journey of Resilience: Balancing Freelancing and Academia in a Foreign Land
item.description: Journey of Resilience: Balancing Freelancing and Academia in a Foreign Land In the heart of a bustling city in a foreign country, where the language was unfamiliar and friends were few, I embarked on an extraordinary journey of self-improvement and professional growth.

item.description: Data Science for Decision Making Course in Barcelona Schools of Economics As a strong believer in continuous education I was accepted as BSE, #86 QS WUR Ranking By Subject, for the academic year of 2022-2023.

item.title: EXAM PERIOD!
item.description: IETLS & GRE I believe that continuous education is extremelly important if one wants to succeed in this life.
